item.title: Trump responds to appearance in new Epstein emails by pushing DOJ probe of Clinton, Larry Summers, Reid Hoffman
item.description: Across messages with lawyers, acquaintances, reporters, academics, and political figures, Epstein invoked Trump constantly.

item.title: Verizon will cut about 15,000 jobs after new CEO says ‘cost reductions will be a way of life for us here’
item.description: CEO Daniel Schulman, who formerly headed PayPal’s global transformation and Virgin Mobile’s $483 million sale, looks to turn around the telecoms giant...

item.title: 43-year-old democratic socialist who’s never held elected office unseats Seattle Mayor in another win for affordability politics
item.description: Katie Wilson is a renter herself, of a one-bedroom apartment in Capitol Hill, and says it shaped her understanding of Seattle’s affordability crisis.

item.title: Cincinnati Reds great Barry Larkin brings baseball to the Middle East, with camels carting in relief pitchers from the bullpen
item.description: “Thirty years in the game and I've never seen a camel in the bullpen,” Karachi Monarchs pitching coach Frank Gonzales said. “I kind of like it though....

item.title: White House prepares to host Saudi Crown Prince in an arrival ceremony just short of an official state visit
item.description: His visit is billed as an official working visit because Prince Mohammed is not technically a head of state, the official said.
